description.text: Megadiverse countries are nations that are home to the world’s greatest biodiversity. Mexico has the honor of being among the 19 countries that qualify as megadiverse.
This diversity in ecosystems makes it one of the top destinations for adventurous souls who want to get their adrenaline pumping and enjoy nature.
Mountains, rivers, deserts, oceans, and endless natural scenery await you with open arms.

Among the adventures waiting for you you’ll find rapids, rappelling, surfing, bicycling, diving, high-speed ziplining, sailing, mountain climbing, and more. Experience the adventure of your life in Mexico!
